entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
